text:
HUGE NEWS!!!!

⭐️ We’ve been blown away by the response for #Reviews4Good, so we're extending the donation period all the way through April! 

🙌 We're also bringing on partners to raise EVEN MORE money for the Meals on Wheels‘ COVID-19 Response Fund!
